description.zh-cn: 中华民国无党籍法界人士，出生于台湾云林县元长乡，曾任法务部政务次长、花莲县代理县长等职。
description.en: A non-partisan legal figure from the Republic of China, born in Yuanzhang Township, Yunlin County, Taiwan. He has served as Political Deputy Minister of Justice and acting magistrate of Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的中央行政机关之一，负责国家的司法行政事务。
description.en: One of the central administrative agencies of the Republic of China, responsible for the nation's judicial administrative affairs.

description.zh-cn: 台湾花莲县的最高地方行政机关。
description.en: The highest local administrative body of Hualien County, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国法界人士，曾任法务部政务次长。
description.en: A legal figure from the Republic of China who has served as Political Deputy Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、检察官，曾任法务部部长。
description.en: A politician and prosecutor from the Republic of China, who has served as the Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、律师，曾任法务部部长。
description.en: A politician and lawyer from the Republic of China, who has served as the Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任花莲县县长。
description.en: A politician from the Republic of China, who has served as the magistrate of Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾代理花莲县县长。
description.en: A politician from the Republic of China, who has served as the acting magistrate of Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，现任花莲县县长。
description.en: A politician from the Republic of China, currently serving as the magistrate of Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 蔡碧仲的配偶。
description.en: Spouse of Tsai Pi-chung.

nodes.id: 台北市立成功高级中学

zh-cn: 台北市立成功高级中学

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市中的一所市立高级中学。
description.en: A municipal senior high school located in Taipei, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的一所国立大学。
description.en: A national university located in Taipei, Taiwan.

nodes.id: 中华民国律师公会全国联合会

zh-cn: 中华民国律师公会全国联合会

description.zh-cn: 中华民国律师的全国性组织。
description.en: The national bar association for lawyers in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国法务部所属的检察机关，位于嘉义。
description.en: A prosecutorial agency under the Ministry of Justice of the Republic of China, located in Chiayi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国法务部所属的检察机关，位于云林。
description.en: A prosecutorial agency under the Ministry of Justice of the Republic of China, located in Yunlin.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国法务部所属的检察机关，位于澎湖。
description.en: A prosecutorial agency under the Ministry of Justice of the Republic of China, located in Penghu.

nodes.id: 行政院洗钱防制办公室

zh-cn: 行政院洗钱防制办公室

description.zh-cn: 中华民国行政院设立的负责洗钱防制政策的机构。
description.en: An office established by the Executive Yuan of the Republic of China responsible for anti-money laundering policies.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物、外交官，曾任花莲县立法委员。
description.en: A politician and diplomat from the Republic of China, who has served as a legislator for Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 台湾云林县下辖的一个乡。
description.en: A township in Yunlin County, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 蔡碧仲的配偶是黄淑英。
description.en: Tsai Pi-chung's spouse is Huang Shu-ying.

relationships.target: 台北市立成功高级中学
中华民国律师公会全国联合会
行政院洗钱防制办公室

description.zh-cn: 在担任法务部政务次长期间，向时任部长蔡清祥汇报。
description.en: Reported to then-Minister Tsai Ching-hsiang while serving as Political Deputy Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 在担任法务部政务次长期间，向时任部长邱太三汇报。
description.en: Reported to then-Minister Chiu Tai-san while serving as Political Deputy Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 因时任花莲县长傅崐萁遭解职，行政院指派蔡碧仲代理花莲县县长。
description.en: Due to the dismissal of then-Hualien County Magistrate Fu Kun-chi, the Executive Yuan appointed Tsai Pi-chung as the acting magistrate.

description.zh-cn: 蔡碧仲接替颜新章，出任代理花莲县县长。
description.en: Tsai Pi-chung succeeded Yen Hsin-chang as the acting magistrate of Hualien County.

description.zh-cn: 蔡碧仲代理花莲县县长任期届满，由徐榛蔚接任正任县长。
description.en: Tsai Pi-chung's term as acting magistrate of Hualien County ended, and Hsu Chen-wei took over as the duly elected magistrate.

description.zh-cn: 在法务部担任政务次长期间，与陈明堂为同事。
description.en: Was a colleague of Chen Ming-tang while serving as Political Deputy Minister of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 在脸书公开贴文，表态支持时为立法委员候选人的萧美琴。
description.en: Publicly posted on Facebook to endorse Hsiao Bi-khim, who was then a legislative candidate.

description.zh-cn: 因蔡碧仲在脸书公开支持特定候选人引发争议，时任法务部长蔡清祥当面劝说其“谨言慎行”，随后蔡碧仲删除该贴文。
description.en: After Tsai Pi-chung's public endorsement of a specific candidate on Facebook caused controversy, then-Minister of Justice Tsai Ching-hsiang advised him in person to "be prudent in his words and actions," after which Tsai Pi-chung deleted the post.
